__TOC__

This Pages lists all places, where the System still needs Config files to know about the used hardware and can not autodetect those and so the user needs to fight with files or configuration tools, if he changes hardware.

== Xorg ==
* /etc/X11/xorg.conf
** Input devices
** Monitors
** VGA-Cards

== fstab ==
* /etc/fstab
** disk type (IDE or SATA/SCSI)

== Network ==
* /etc/network/interfaces
** some WLAN-Cards are eth*, some ra*, some ath*, some wlan*...
